message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I believe this split reflects the fact that I'll be losing more value in the following rounds due to the higher inflation rate affecting my share.
I appreciate your offer, but I believe this split is more equitable, considering the inflation rates we're facing.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
Bob, it seems we're at an impasse. I'm willing to adjust my initial offer slightly, but I can't accept a deal where I continuously lose value.  This is my final offer.
